example02.sentence: Not the biggest portions but adequate.

example03.sentence: Green Tea creme brulee is a must!

example04.sentence: – I can't say enough about this place.

example05.sentence: It has great sushi and even better service.

example06.sentence: The entire staff was extremely accomodating and tended to my every need.

example07.sentence: I've been to this restaurant over a dozen times with no complaints to date.

example08.sentence: The owner is belligerent to guests that have a complaint.

example10.sentence: This is a great place to get a delicious meal.

example13.sentence: – I was highly disappointed in the food at Pagoda.

example14.sentence: The lemon chicken tasted like sticky sweet donuts and the honey walnut prawns, the few they actually give you.....were not good.

example15.sentence: Nice ambience, but highly overrated place.

example17.sentence: Everyone that sat in the back outside agreed that it was the worst service we had ever received.

example18.sentence: Our waiter was non-existent and after our food finally arrived over an hour after we ordered, we were not given any water or utensils.

example19.sentence: I complained to the manager, but he was not even apologetic.

example22.sentence: I am so happy to have a wonderful Italian restaurant in my neighborhood.

example23.sentence: The wine list is wonderful and the food reminds me of my recent trip to Italy.

example25.sentence: – I will never forget the amazing meal, service, and ambiance I experience at this restaurant.

example26.sentence: The wine list is incredible and extensive and diverse, the food is all incredible and the staff was all very nice, good at their jobs and cultured.

example27.sentence: I have not a bad thing to say about this place.

example29.sentence: It's *very* reasonably priced, esp for the quality of the food.

example30.sentence: I had the Kafta plate and it was perfect.

example31.sentence: Finally a meal that you will remember for a long time!

example32.sentence: – In a age of incremental cost cutting in restaurants, its nice to see a place that bucks that trend, and just plain delivers high quality food and good service, period.

example33.sentence: This is the place to relax and enjoy the finest quality food the industry can offer.

example34.sentence: Caution - its real food for people who love the best.

example35.sentence: I liked the atmosphere very much but the food was not worth the price.

example36.sentence: I may not be a sushi guru but I can tell you that the food here is just okay and that there is not much else to it.

example37.sentence: Rice is too dry, tuna wasn't so fresh either.

example38.sentence: I have eaten here three times and have found the quality and variety of the fish to be excellent.

example39.sentence: However, the value and service are both severely lacking.

example40.sentence: Furthermore, while the fish is unquestionably fresh, rolls tend to be inexplicably bland.

example41.sentence: The service ranges from mediocre to offensive.

example42.sentence: On a recent trip, our waiter was extremely dismissive, while no less than three staff members waited hand-and-foot on a pair of Japanese girls seated nearby.

example43.sentence: Freshest sushi  – I love this restaurant.

example44.sentence: They pay such detail to everything from miso soup to complex rolls.

example45.sentence: The sashimi was the freshest and most tender I have ever tasted.

example47.sentence: The only drawback is that this place is really expensive and the portions are on the small side.

example48.sentence: But the space is small and lovely, and the service is helpful.

example49.sentence: – The food was not great & the waiters were rude.
